extendedInfo.description: LearnZillion (learnzillion.com) is an online learning platform that helps teachers and parents meet the educational needs of every student.  We provide teachers with high quality video lessons and teaching materials--produced by top teachers from around the country.  Each lesson highlights a Common Core standard and can be assigned directly to students or used to plan high quality lessons. LearnZillion for students allows students to complete assignments on their iPhone or iPad. Students can also manage their classes, search through the entire video library, and review their scores on past assignments.Features:* LearnZillion allows personalized learning to happen anytime and anywhere.  Students can get lesson anytime, freeing up class-time for the application of skills and content. * Students can received personalized assignments, so that they get exactly the lessons they need when they need them.* Video lessons can be saved on the device and watched later--even when the internet isn't available.* Everything that a student does in the app is also reflected in their account and their teacher's account on the web.Learn more and sign up for a parent or teacher account at learnzillion.com

reviews.title: Eh...
reviews.comment: Can\'t search for videos or enter video codes. Could only view assignments.
reviews.author: James Ouyang

reviews.title: Needs to be fixed.... BADLY
reviews.comment: I cant do anything except login or it crashes!!
reviews.author: Nathan Pendergrast

reviews.title: Hooray!
reviews.comment: I am happy to see a tool I use in my classroom available to my students at home.
reviews.author: Sandi Duran
